disease: Gastrointestinal stromal tumor of other sites

imaging_findings.CT: Solid, contrast-enhancing mass with smooth margins
imaging_findings.MRI: Alternative to CT, especially if iodinated contrast is contraindicated
imaging_findings.Endoscopy: Sub-epithelial lesions (SEL) with a smooth bulge covered with normal-appearing mucosa
imaging_findings.EUS: Hypoechoic solid mass originating from the second (muscularis mucosa) or fourth (muscularis propria) layers of the GI tract wall

required: Morphologic findings consistent with GIST on hematoxylin-eosin (H&E) staining
Immunohistochemical testing positive for KIT (in approximately 95% of cases), or DOG-1 and CD34 if KIT is negative
